original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā udāyī sāvatthiyaṁ kulūpako hoti, bahukāni kulāni upasaṅkamati.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena āyasmai udāyī sāvatthiyam kulūpakaḥ hoti bahukāni kulāni upasaṅkamati

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī matapatikā abhirūpā hoti dassanīyā pāsādikā.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī mata patikā abhirūpā hoti dassanīyā pāsādikā

original: Atha kho āyasmā udāyī pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena tassā itthiyā nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai udāyī pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya yena tassāḥ itthiyāḥ nivesanam tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi

original: Atha kho sā itthī yenāyasmā udāyī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha khalu sā itthī yena ayasmai udāyī tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam udāyim abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho taṁ itthiṁ āyasmā udāyī dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnam kho tam itthim āyasmai udāyī dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahasesi

original: Atha kho sā itthī āyasmatā udāyinā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṁsitā āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: atha kho sā itthī āyasmatā udāyinā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahasitā āyasmantam udāyim etat avoca
paṭibalāḥ mayam ayyassa dātum yat idam cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhāranti

original: “Na kho te, bhagini, amhākaṁ dullabhā yadidaṁ cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā.
analyzed: na kho te bhagini amhākam dullabhā yat idam cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhārā

original: Api ca yo amhākaṁ dullabho taṁ dehī”ti.
analyzed: api ca yaḥ amhākam dullabhaḥ tam dehi iti

original: ovarakaṁ pavisitvā sāṭakaṁ nikkhipitvā mañcake uttānā nipajji.
analyzed: ovarakam pavisitvā sāṭakam nikkhipitvā mañcake uttānā nipajji

original: Atha kho āyasmā udāyī yena sā itthī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā—
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmai udāyī yena sā itthī tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā
kaḥ imam vasalam duggandham āmasissati iti

original: Atha kho sā itthī ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
analyzed: atha kho sā itthī ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti
alajjinaḥ ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyāḥ dussīlāḥ musā vādinaḥ

original: Ime hi nāma dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā paṭijānissanti.
analyzed: ime hi nāma dhamma cārinaḥ sama cārinaḥ brahmacārinaḥ sacca vādinaḥ sīlavantaḥ kalyāṇa dhammā paṭijānissanti

original: Natthi imesaṁ sāmaññaṁ natthi imesaṁ brahmaññaṁ, naṭṭhaṁ imesaṁ sāmaññaṁ naṭṭhaṁ imesaṁ brahmaññaṁ, kuto imesaṁ sāmaññaṁ kuto imesaṁ brahmaññaṁ,
analyzed: natthi imesam sāmaññam natthi imesam brahmañña naṭṭham imesam sāmaññam naṭṭham imesam brahmañña kutas imesam sāmaññam kutas imesam brahmañña

original: apagatā ime sāmaññā apagatā ime brahmaññā.
analyzed: apagatāḥ ime sāmaññāḥ apagatāḥ ime brahmaññā

original: Kathañhi nāma samaṇo udāyī maṁ sāmaṁ methunadhammaṁ yācitvā, ‘ko imaṁ vasalaṁ duggandhaṁ āmasissatī’ti niṭṭhubhitvā pakkamissati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma samaṇaḥ udāyī mam sāmam methuna dhammam yācitvā kaḥ imam vasalam duggandham āmasissati iti niṭṭhubhitvā pakkamissati

original: Kiṁ me pāpakaṁ kiṁ me duggandhaṁ,
analyzed: kim me pāpakam kim me duggandha
aññā api itthiyaḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti
alajjinaḥ ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyāḥ dussīlāḥ musā vādinaḥ pe

original: kathañhi nāma samaṇo udāyī imissā sāmaṁ methunadhammaṁ yācitvā, ‘ko imaṁ vasalaṁ duggandhaṁ āmasissatī’ti niṭṭhubhitvā pakkamissati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma samaṇaḥ udāyī imissā sāmam methuna dhammam yācitvā kaḥ imam vasalam duggandham āmasissati iti niṭṭhubhitvā pakkamissati

original: Kiṁ imissā pāpakaṁ kiṁ imissā duggandhaṁ, kassāyaṁ kena hāyatī”ti?
analyzed: kim imissā pāpakam kim imissā duggandha kassa ayam kena hāyati iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tāsaṁ itthīnaṁ ujjhāyantīnaṁ khiyyantīnaṁ vipācentīnaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tāsam itthīnam ujjhāyantīnam khiyyantīnam vipācentīnam

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā udāyī mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsissatī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma āyasmai udāyī mātugāmassa santike atta kāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇam bhāsissati iti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantam udāyim aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesu

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ paṭipucchi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe bhikkhu saṅgham sannipātāpetvā āyasmantam udāyim paṭipucchi

original: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, udāyi, mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsasī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tvam udāyi mātugāmassa santike atta kāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇam bhāsasi iti

original: “ananucchavikaṁ, moghapurisa, ananulomikaṁ appatirūpaṁ assāmaṇakaṁ akappiyaṁ akaraṇīyaṁ.
analyzed: ananucchavika moghapurisa ananulomikam appatirūpam a sāmaṇakam a kappiyam a karaṇīya

original: Kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsissasi.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tva mogha purisa mātu gāmassa santike atta kāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇam bhāsissasi

original: Nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena virāgāya dhammo desito no sarāgāya …pe…
analyzed: nanu mayā moghapurisa aneka pariyāyena virāgāya dhammo desito no sa rāgāya pe
neta moghapurisa appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu otiṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu otiṇṇaḥ vipariṇatena cittena mātugāmassa santike atta kāma pāricariyāya

original: vaṇṇaṁ bhāseyya— ‘etadaggaṁ, bhagini, pāricariyānaṁ yā mādisaṁ sīlavantaṁ kalyāṇadhammaṁ
analyzed: vaṇṇam bhāseyya etat agga bhagini pāricariyānam yā mādisam sīlavantam kalyāṇa dhamma

original: brahmacāriṁ etena dhammena paricareyyāti methunupasaṁhitena’, saṅghādiseso”ti.
analyzed: brahmacārim etena dhammena paricareyya ati methun upasahitena saṅgha ādisesaḥ ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: rattampi cittaṁ vipariṇataṁ, duṭṭhampi cittaṁ vipariṇataṁ, mūḷhampi cittaṁ vipariṇataṁ.
analyzed: rattam api cittam vipariṇata duṭṭham api cittam vipariṇata mūḷham api cittam vipariṇata

original: Api ca rattaṁ cittaṁ imasmiṁ atthe adhippetaṁ vipariṇatanti.
analyzed: api ca rattam cittam imasmin atthe adhippetam vipariṇatanti

original: manussitthī, na yakkhī, na petī, na tiracchānagatā. Viññū paṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitaṁ duṭṭhullāduṭṭhullaṁ ājānituṁ.
analyzed: manussitthī na yakkhī na petī na tiracchānagatā viññū paṭibalā subhāsita dubbhāsitam duṭṭhulla aduṭṭhullam ājānitu

original: attano kāmaṁ attano hetuṁ attano adhippāyaṁ attano pāricariyaṁ.
analyzed: attano kāmam attano hetum attano adhippāyam attano pāricariya

original: etaṁ aggaṁ etaṁ seṭṭhaṁ etaṁ mokkhaṁ etaṁ uttamaṁ etaṁ pavaraṁ.
analyzed: etam aggam etam seṭṭham etam mokkham etam uttamam etam pavara

original: khattiyī vā brāhmaṇī vā vessī vā suddī vā.
analyzed: khattiyī vā brāhmaṇī vā vessī vā suddī vā

original: khattiyaṁ vā brāhmaṇaṁ vā vessaṁ vā suddaṁ vā.
analyzed: khattiyam vā brāhmaṇam vā vessam vā suddam vā

original: pāṇātipātā paṭivirataṁ, adinnādānā paṭivirataṁ, musāvādā paṭivirataṁ.
analyzed: pāṇa atipātā a dinna ādānā paṭivirata musā vādā paṭivirata

original: tena ca sīlena tena ca brahmacariyena kalyāṇadhammo hoti.
analyzed: tena ca sīlena tena ca brahmacariyena kalyāṇa dhammaḥ hoti
pe tena api vuccati saṅgha ādiseso ti

original: Itthī ca hoti itthisaññī sāratto ca.
analyzed: itthī ca hoti itthi saññī sārattaḥ ca

original: Bhikkhu ca naṁ itthiyā santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
analyzed: bhikkhu ca nam itthiyā santike atta kāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇam bhāsati āpatti saṅgha adisesassa

original: Bhikkhu ca naṁ itthiyā santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, āpatti thullaccayassa.
analyzed: bhikkhu ca nam itthiyā santike atta kāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇam bhāsati āpatti thullaccayassa

original: Paṇḍako ca hoti paṇḍakasaññī sāratto ca.
analyzed: paṇḍako ca hoti paṇḍaka saññī sāratto ca

original: Bhikkhu ca naṁ paṇḍakassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, āpatti thullaccayassa.
analyzed: bhikkhu ca nam paṇḍakassa santike atta kāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇam bhāsati āpatti thullaccayassa

original: Bhikkhu ca naṁ paṇḍakassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: bhikkhu ca nam paṇḍakassa santike atta kāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇam bhāsati āpatti dukkaṭassa
tiracchāna gataḥ ca hoti tiracchāna gata saññī pe

original: Bhikkhu ca naṁ tiracchānagatassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: bhikkhu ca nam tiracchāna gatassa santike atta kāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇam bhāsati āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Dve itthiyo dvinnaṁ itthīnaṁ itthisaññī sāratto ca.
analyzed: dve itthiyaḥ dvinnam itthīnam itthi saññī sārattaḥ ca

original: Bhikkhu ca naṁ dvinnaṁ itthīnaṁ santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, āpatti dvinnaṁ saṅghādisesānaṁ.
analyzed: bhikkhu ca nam dvinnam itthīnam santike atta kāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇam bhāsati āpatti dvinnam saṅgha adisesāna

original: Itthī ca paṇḍako ca ubhinnaṁ itthisaññī sāratto ca.
analyzed: itthī ca paṇḍako ca ubhinnam itthi saññī sārattaḥ ca

original: Bhikkhu ca naṁ ubhinnaṁ santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, āpatti saṅghādisesena dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: bhikkhu ca naṃ ubhinnam santike atta kāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇam bhāsati āpatti saṅgha adisesena dukkaṭassa
cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhārena upaṭṭhahāti bhaṇati

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā vañjhā itthī kulūpakaṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarā vañjhā itthī kulūpakam bhikkhum etat avoca
tena hi bhagini agga dānam dehi iti

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā vijāyinī itthī kulūpakaṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarā vijāyinī itthī kulūpakam bhikkhum etat avoca
kathā āha bhante puttam labheyyan ti
tena hi bhagini agga dānam dehi iti

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī kulūpakaṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī kulūpakam bhikkhum etat avoca
kathā aha bhante sāmikassa piyāḥ assanti
tena hi bhagini agga dānam dehi iti

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī kulūpakaṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī kulūpakam bhikkhum etat avoca
tena hi bhagini agga dānam dehi iti

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī kulūpakaṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī kulūpakam bhikkhum etat avoca
kyā āha bhante ayyassa dajjāmi iti

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī kulūpakaṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī kulūpakam bhikkhum etat avoca
kena āha bhante ayyam upaṭṭhemi iti

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī kulūpakaṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī kulūpakam bhikkhum etat avoca
tena hi bhagini agga dānam dehi iti
atta kāma pāricariya sikkhāpadam niṭṭhitam catuttha
